alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 17 at 3:53AM EDT until April 18 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 13 inches. The heaviest snow accumulations will be in the Porcupine Mountains and in the western portions of the county with amounts decreasing with distance away from Lake Superior. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph, potentially higher closer to the lakeshore. * WHERE...Ontonagon County. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
